alert.note: Alert for Caledonia; Essex (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 5:22PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Caledonia and central Essex Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 521 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over St. Johnsbury, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... St. Johnsbury, Lyndon, East Haven, Ferdinand, Granby, Kirby, Victory, Brunswick, Bloomfield, Maidstone, Maidstone State Park, Lewis, Waterford, Burke, Concord, Guildhall, Newark, Lunenburg, Brighton, and St. Johnsbury Center. This includes the following highways... Interstate 91 between mile markers 129 and 132. Interstate 93 between mile markers 5 and 10. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
